metadata.title: CVE-2022-1247 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue found in linux-kernel that leads to a race condition inrose_connect(). The rose driver uses rose_neigh->use to represent how manyobjects are using the rose_neigh. When a user wants to delete a rose_routevia rose_ioctl(), the rose driver calls rose_del_node() and removesneighbours only if their “count” and “use” are zero.
